**Hats** are a form of head [armour](/Armour "Armour"). Unlike [helmets](/Helmet "Helmet"), they provide no base [AC](/AC "AC"), but can be used by characters with [beaks](/Beak "Beak") and all but the largest of [horns](/Horns "Horns") and [antennae](/Antennae "Antennae"). They can be maximally [enchanted](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") to +2.

Hats can have the following [egos](/Ego "Ego"):

- [Intelligence](/Intelligence "Intelligence") (+3)
- [Willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") (+40)
- [Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth") (+50)
- [See invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible")

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), hats couldn't have [Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth") ego.
- Prior to [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), hats could have [Spirit shield](/Spirit_shield "Spirit shield") ego.
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), you could find hats with cold and fire resistance egos in [ice caves](/Ice_cave "Ice cave") and [volcanoes](/Volcano "Volcano") respectively.
- Hats were added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), consolidating [wizard hats](/Wizard_hat "Wizard hat") and [caps](/Cap "Cap").
